title: how to learn Socket.io in 2023
content: Although Socket.IO indeed uses WebSocket for transport when possible, it adds additional metadata to each packet. That is why a WebSocket client will not be able to successfully connect to a Socket.IO server, and a Socket.IO client will not be able to connect to a plain WebSocket server either. // WARNING: the client will NOT be able to connect! const socket = io If you are looking for a plain WebSocket server, please take a look at ws or ÂµWebSockets.js. There are also discussions for including a WebSocket server in the Node.js core. On the client-side, you might be interested in the robust-websocket package.
